subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Denver Nuggets beat the New Orleans Hornets 121-63, tying the record for the most lopsided victory in N.B.A. history. The victory gave the Nuggets a 3-1 lead in the series.
snippet: The Denver Nuggets beat the New Orleans Hornets 121-63, tying the record for the most lopsided victory in N.B.A. history. The victory gave the Nuggets a 3-1 lead in the series.
